description: This is the first App I install when I set up my OS. I just love how much I can personalize my computer with this!

This should be part of the OS main development. It literally changes the way you interact you PC or laptop. Everything becomes intuitive. And this program is so customisable. Wasn't working on Ubuntu 20.04. That's the main reason I stuck with Kubuntu. No way am I giving up Easystroke. 

I've mapped every program to it, main gestures like 'forwards' and 'backwards'. Also Nord VPN start and stop with a simple gesture on my touchpad.

This is so useful! It responds quite well and the possibilities are limitless. I configure it to open my most common applications all by gesturing some simple movements. Not sure why this isn't a standard option OS's introduce you with!
No work with touch pad,no waste your time.

It's a very important program. I use it for my multi-functional game mouse and it works really well... (unfortunately, it doesn't work under wayland) it's a bit difficult to program, but it's worth spending time on it...
I enjoy it everyday all the time

While it is true that the program is very well made, there are times where it will stop functioning, while after a random period of time, it would start working again for some unknown reason.

As it stands right now, I have to unfortunately give this the "Love & Hate" subjective rating.

Subjective Rating: Love & Hate

Explanation - This is NOT a mediocre application. This program had so much going for it, it was heading towards "Good/Great" or even the "Fantastic" status, but then had serious, SERIOUS flaws, that just dragged it all back down. It is possible that this can upset someone more than any other, and might make you lose sleep thinking about it.
Wollte eine 3-Finger-Wisch-Geste erstellen aber das kann dieses Tool anscheinend nicht.
Al tratar de configurarla, ocurrio ese problema.
summary: Deja una linea con cuadros negros que obstruyen la pantalla

description:
Llevo usándola años y sin ningún problema. 
Para agilizar las acciones mediante gestos de ratón altamente personalizable

Application très pratique !
Il faudrait pouvoir faire des retours à la ligne pour le type "Texte".
Merci !
Je n'est pas trouvé son utilité, les configurations (du boutons 2) ne sont pas libre.
